channel.title: Something the minecraft admins/mods should have
channel.description:
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/McMyAdmin
it's a web based server management program it's really awesome you can reboot, shut down and start the srever with it you can also enable pvp and other stuff
check it out

item.title: Something the minecraft admins/mods should have
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:377244”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=473148.msg3460154#msg3460154 date=1294411349]
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/McMyAdmin

it’s a web based server management program
it’s really awesome
you can reboot, shut down and start the srever with it
you can also enable pvp and other stuff

check it out
[/quote]We already took a look at this ;). We aren’t going to use it for a few reasons:
It’s written in C#
It’s not free unless you get the free version (which supports only 8 players)

However, we are looking for something free/open-source similar to this.[/quote]ohhh dident knew that…

Read full topic
item.source: Something the minecraft admins/mods should have

item.title: Something the minecraft admins/mods should have
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:1, topic:377244”]http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/McMyAdmin

it’s a web based server management program
it’s really awesome
you can reboot, shut down and start the srever with it
you can also enable pvp and other stuff

check it out[/quote]We already took a look at this ;). We aren’t going to use it for a few reasons:
It’s written in C#
It’s not free unless you get the free version (which supports only 8 players)

However, we are looking for something free/open-source similar to this.

Read full topic
